item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Beck. Welcome to my blog. I have a diverse background in biological research, including developmental biology, plant genetics, microbial ecology, molecular biology, epidemiology, environmental health, and bioinformatics. Currently I work as an environmental consultant in Florida, where I have a small consulting business with my dad.
